item.title: Cabbys Scripts
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

[center][b]Contents:

  1. Auto-Talker
  2. Auto-Clicker
  3. Auto-Cutter
  4. Auto-Banner[/b][/center]

[glow=red,2,300]AUTO-TALKER[/glow]

program Autotalker; Const Whattosay = 'TEXTHERE';//Type F1 to say begin writeln('Currently using Cabbys Auto-Talker') repeat if(IsFKeyDown(1))then begin sendkeys(Whattosay); SendKeysVb('{ENTER}',false); end; wait(300);//Keeps it from saying it more than once on only one click //if you remove it, it will keep saying it. I suggest not to. until(false) end. //--------------------------------------- //| Thanks for using Cabbys Auto-talker!| //---------------------------------------

[glow=red,2,300]AUTO-CLICKER[/glow]

program Autoclicker; Const Betweentime = 5; //Wait in between each click. IN SECONDS! //If you change the between time, make sure the wait //is changed. For example: //"betweentime = 5;" then change "wait((betweentime * 1000) to // "wait((betweentime * 5000) var x,y:integer; begin writeln('Currently using Cabbys Auto-Clicker') repeat getmousepos(x,y); clickmouse(640, 347, True); //Use Color Picker to get the mouse // position to click at wait((Betweentime * 5000) + random(300)) until(false) end. // |------------------------------------| // |Thanks For Using Cabbys Autoclicker!| // |------------------------------------|

[glow=red,2,300]Auto-Cutter[/glow]
THIS CODE WILL BE BACK WHEN I FIX IT

[glow=red,2,300]Auto-Banner[/glow]-untested

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Auto-ban

Author = Cabby

Description = Auto-Ban Yourself

Version = 1.0

Date = Satuday January 13, 2007

Comments = Autoer for Runescape

/Script Info}

//Include “Squig.txt”.
//Use at own risk.
//Get to the world You want to be at and run script., DONT LOG IN!
//For Script to work right only edit Username and Password.
program AutoBan;
begin
clickmouse(627, 412, true)
wait(1000)
sendkeys (‘Username’) //Username-Type your Username
wait(1000)
clickmouse (411,273,true)
wait(1000)
sendkeys (‘Password’) //Password-Type your Password.
wait(1000)
clickmouse (303,322,true)
end;
wait(3000)
begin
writeln(‘thanks for using my auto-ban!’)
repeat
sendkeys(‘I"m spamming! REPORT ME YOU GAY HOMO!’)
wait(4000)
sendkeys('REPORT ME I"M AUOTING!
until(false)[/code]

Will add more when I make them!
